verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> also came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> you dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> who have eyes <S%H5869><s%> to see, <S%H7200><s%> and don't <S%H7200><s%> see, who have ears <S%H241><s%> to hear, <S%H8085><s%> and don't <S%H8085><s%> hear; for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

Therefore, <S%H1121><s%> you son of man, <S%H120><s%> prepare <S%H6213><s%> your stuff <S%H3627><s%> for moving, <S%H1473><s%> and move <S%H1540><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight; <S%H5869><s%> and you shall move <S%H1540><s%> from your place <S%H4725><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> in their sight: <S%H5869><s%> it may be they will consider, <S%H7200><s%> though they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house. <S%H1004><s%>

You shall bring forth <S%H3318><s%> your stuff <S%H3627><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> as stuff <S%H3627><s%> for moving; <S%H1473><s%> and you shall go forth <S%H3318><s%> yourself at even <S%H6153><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> as when men go forth <S%H4161><s%> into exile. <S%H1473><s%>
Dig <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> in their sight, <S%H5869><s%> and carry your stuff out that way. <S%H3318><s%>

In their sight <S%H5869><s%> you shall bear <S%H5375><s%> it on your shoulder, <S%H3802><s%> and carry it forth <S%H3318><s%> in the dark; <S%H5939><s%> you shall cover <S%H3680><s%> your face, <S%H6440><s%> so that you don't <S%H7200><s%> see the land: <S%H776><s%> for I have set <S%H5414><s%> you for a sign <S%H4159><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

I did <S%H6213><s%> so as I was commanded: <S%H6680><s%> I brought forth <S%H3318><s%> my stuff <S%H3627><s%> by day, <S%H3119><s%> as stuff <S%H3627><s%> for removing, <S%H1473><s%> and in the even <S%H6153><s%> I dug <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> with my hand; <S%H3027><s%> I brought it forth <S%H3318><s%> in the dark, <S%H5939><s%> and bore <S%H5375><s%> it on my shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
In the morning <S%H1242><s%> came the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> has not the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H6213><s%> What are you doing?

Say <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> This burden <S%H4853><s%> concerns the prince <S%H5387><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> among whom they are. <S%H8432><s%>

Say, <S%H559><s%> I am your sign: <S%H4159><s%> like as I have done, <S%H6213><s%> so shall it be done <S%H6213><s%> to them; <S%H3212><s%> they shall go into exile, <S%H1473><s%> into captivity. <S%H7628><s%>

The prince <S%H5387><s%> who is among <S%H8432><s%> them shall bear <S%H5375><s%> on his shoulder <S%H3802><s%> in the dark, <S%H5939><s%> and shall go forth: <S%H3318><s%> they shall dig <S%H2864><s%> through the wall <S%H7023><s%> to carry out <S%H3318><s%> thereby: <S%H3680><s%> he shall cover his face, <S%H6440><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> he shall not see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> with his eyes. <S%H5869><s%>

My net <S%H7568><s%> also will I spread <S%H6566><s%> on him, <S%H8610><s%> and he shall be taken in my snare; <S%H4686><s%> and I will bring <S%H935><s%> him to Babylon <S%H894><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the Chaldeans; <S%H3778><s%> yet shall he not see <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H4191><s%> though he shall die there.

I will scatter <S%H2219><s%> toward every wind <S%H7307><s%> all who are around <S%H5439><s%> him to help <S%H5828><s%> him, <S%H102><s%> and all his bands; and I will draw out <S%H7324><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> after them. <S%H310><s%>

They shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when I shall disperse <S%H2219><s%> them among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and scatter <S%H6327><s%> them through the countries. <S%H776><s%>

But I will leave <S%H3498><s%> a few <S%H4557><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of them from the sword, <S%H2719><s%> from the famine, <S%H7458><s%> and from the pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> that they may declare <S%H5608><s%> all their abominations <S%H8441><s%> among the nations <S%H1471><s%> where they come; <S%H935><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> eat <S%H398><s%> your bread <S%H3899><s%> with quaking, <S%H7494><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> your water <S%H4325><s%> with trembling <S%H7269><s%> and with fearfulness; <S%H1674><s%>

and tell <S%H559><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land, <S%H127><s%> Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh <S%H136><s%> concerning the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> They shall eat <S%H398><s%> their bread <S%H3899><s%> with fearfulness, <S%H1674><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> their water <S%H4325><s%> in dismay, <S%H8078><s%> that her land <S%H776><s%> may be desolate, <S%H3456><s%> and all that is therein, <S%H4393><s%> because of the violence <S%H2555><s%> of all those who dwell therein. <S%H3427><s%>

The cities <S%H5892><s%> that are inhabited <S%H3427><s%> shall be laid waste, <S%H2717><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be a desolation; <S%H8077><s%> and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
The word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> what is this proverb <S%H4912><s%> that you have in the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The days <S%H3117><s%> are prolonged, <S%H748><s%> and every vision <S%H2377><s%> fails? <S%H6><s%>

Tell <S%H559><s%> them therefore, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> I will make this proverb <S%H4912><s%> to cease, <S%H7673><s%> and they shall no more use it as a proverb <S%H4911><s%> in Israel; <S%H3478><s%> but tell <S%H1696><s%> them, <S%H3117><s%> The days are at hand, <S%H7126><s%> and the fulfillment <S%H1697><s%> of every vision. <S%H2377><s%>
For there shall be no more any false <S%H7723><s%> vision <S%H2377><s%> nor flattering <S%H2509><s%> divination <S%H4738><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For I am Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> I will speak, <S%H1696><s%> and the word <S%H1697><s%> that I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> shall be performed; <S%H6213><s%> it shall be no more deferred: <S%H4900><s%> for in your days, <S%H3117><s%> rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> will I speak <S%H1696><s%> the word, <S%H1697><s%> and will perform <S%H6213><s%> it, <S%H1696><s%> says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came to me, <S%H559><s%> saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> behold, <S%H1004><s%> they of the house of Israel <S%H3478><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> The vision <S%H2377><s%> that he sees <S%H2372><s%> is for many <S%H7227><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to come, <S%H6256><s%> and he prophesies of times that are far off. <S%H7350><s%>

Therefore tell <S%H559><s%> them, <S%H559><s%> Thus says the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3069><s%> None of my words <S%H1697><s%> shall be deferred <S%H4900><s%> any more, <S%H1697><s%> but the word which I shall speak <S%H1696><s%> shall be performed, <S%H6213><s%> says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3069><s%>
